sqlset.name: COMMUNITY_CUSTOM

sql-query.name: SELECT_ISSUE_STATS_BY_YEAR
sql-query.description: 특정 기간 동안 이슈 요약 정보 조회

sqlset.sql-query: SELECT T1.ISSUE_TYPE, T1.ISSUE_STATUS, TO_CHAR( T1.DUE_DATE , 'MM' ) AS DUE_MONTH, TO_CHAR( T1.CREATION_DATE , 'MM' ) AS CREATION_MONTH, TO_CHAR( T1.RESOLUTION_DATE , 'MM' ) AS RESOLUTION_MONTH FROM REP_ISSUE T1 WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(T1.CREATION_DATE, 'YYYY') OR TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(T1.RESOLUTION_DATE, 'YYYY')

sql-query.name: SELECT_ISSUE_SUMMARY_BY_PERIOD
sql-query.description: 특정 기간 동안 이슈 요약 정보 조회

sqlset.sql-query:
SELECT T2.PROJECT_ID, T2.NAME AS PROJECT_NAME , T1.ISSUE_ID, T1.SUMMARY AS ISSUE_SUMMARY, T1.ISSUE_TYPE, T1.PRIORITY AS ISSUE_PRIORITY, T1.RESOLUTION AS ISSUE_RESOLUTION, T1.ISSUE_STATUS, T1.REPOTER, T1.ASSIGNEE, T1.DUE_DATE, T1.RESOLUTION_DATE, T1.CREATION_DATE, T1.MODIFIED_DATE FROM REP_ISSUE T1 , REP_PROJECT T2
WHERE T1.OBJECT_TYPE = 19 AND T1.OBJECT_ID = T2.PROJECT_ID AND ( ( T1.DUE_DATE IS NULL AND TO_CHAR( T1.CREATION_DATE , 'YYYYMMDD' ) BETWEEN '${data.startDate}' AND '${data.endDate}' ) OR ( T1.DUE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR( T1.DUE_DATE , 'YYYYMMDD' ) BETWEEN '${data.startDate}' AND '${data.endDate}' ) OR ( T1.RESOLUTION_DATE IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR( T1.RESOLUTION_DATE , 'YYYYMMDD' ) BETWEEN '${data.startDate}' AND '${data.endDate}' ) )

sql-query.name: SELECT_ISSUE_REMAILS_BY_DATE
sql-query.description: 특정 일자 이전까지 미처리 건수 조회

sqlset.sql-query:
SELECT T2.PROJECT_ID, T2.NAME AS PROJECT_NAME , count( T1.ISSUE_ID ) as CNT FROM REP_ISSUE T1 , REP_PROJECT T2
WHERE T1.OBJECT_TYPE = 19 AND T1.OBJECT_ID = T2.PROJECT_ID AND ( T1.ISSUE_STATUS != '005' OR T1.ISSUE_STATUS IS NULL ) AND ( ( T1.DUE_DATE IS NULL AND TO_CHAR( T1.CREATION_DATE , 'YYYYMMDD' ) <= '${data.endDate}' ) OR ( T1.DUE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND TO_CHAR( T1.DUE_DATE , 'YYYYMMDD' ) <= '${data.endDate}' ) ) GROUP BY T2.PROJECT_ID, T2.NAME
